sourcesContent:
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title>
      Tab 2
    </ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true">
  <ion-header collapse="condense">
    <ion-toolbar>
      <ion-title size="large">Tab 2</ion-title>
    </ion-toolbar>
  </ion-header>


  <ion-list>
    <ion-item-sliding *ngFor="let item of listData; let i = index;">
      <ion-item >
        <ion-label *ngFor="let d of item">{{d}}</ion-label>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-item-options side="end">
        <ion-item-option color="primary" (click)="removeItem(i)">
          <ion-icon name="trash" slot="icon-only"></ion-icon>
        </ion-item-option>
      </ion-item-options>
    </ion-item-sliding>
  </ion-list>

</ion-content>
import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import {StorageService} from "../services/storage/storage.service";
import {LinkService} from "../services/link/link.service";


@Component({
  selector: 'app-tab2',
  templateUrl: 'tab2.page.html',
  styleUrls: ['tab2.page.scss']
})
export class Tab2Page {

  listData = [];
  private value: any;
  private value1: any;

  constructor(
    private storageService: StorageService,
  ) {
    this.loadData();
  }

  async loadData(){
    this.listData = await this.storageService.getData();
    for(this.value of this.listData){
      console.log(this.value)

    }
    console.log(this.listData);
  }

  async removeItem(index:any){
    this.storageService.removeItem(index);
    this.listData.splice(index,1);
  }



}
